thread.title: Just in case you missed this MLB The Show glitch
thread.title_full: Just in case you missed this MLB The Show glitch

author: Steven Hansen
title: Just in case you missed this MLB The Show glitch
text:
This beautiful, happy accident from an early build (since ironed out) of MLB The Show 17 made the rounds this weekend, set off by this tweet:
A bug in MLB The Show 17 early development (which has been fixed) pic.twitter.com/UBC78sUF7q 
â€” Steve Noah (@Steve_OS) March 16, 2017 I just didn't want any of you to miss it. I consider it a visual expression of how my soul feels each day I long for the return of the baseball season and its blissful, anesthetizing effect. I would also like David Cronenberg to remake Bull Durham .
